channel.title: Where did you get your cigarettes/weed/alcohol as a kid?
channel.description:
I'm only 15, so I guess that qualifies as a kid. Everyone had to get their shit from somewhere, their parents, friends, etc
When I was 13 everyone at the skate park smoked when they skated, and always shared their smokes. Only smoked when I was there, and quit the habit a while ago. Got the alcohol right off the kitchen counter, mom's amaretto
Weed was a weird story. Started when I was 14 with my best friends sister, and he only found out recently. Really awkward.
Where do you guys get your (shit)? (Steal it, from friends, or buy it from the immigrants who work at the corner shops)

item.title: Where did you get your cigarettes/weed/alcohol as a kid?

item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

cigs: a store
alcohol: bars
weed: friends mostly, dealers when i had to

item.description:
@Java_Ownz_U wrote:

Friends parents, Older sister and older friends for alchohol. Don’t smoke regularly but used to steal from friends parents and older friends and weed older friends. But I’v been 18 for like 6 months now so can do what I want

item.title: Where did you get your cigarettes/weed/alcohol as a kid?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Well, I don’t smoke, but I knew some friends who knew dealers for weed, and my mum would buy me alcohol if I paid and drank it in the house, but I don’t like to ask.

Oh well, just another year and I can buy it legally.

Read full topic

item.source: Where did you get your cigarettes/weed/alcohol as a kid?

item.title: Where did you get your cigarettes/weed/alcohol as a kid?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

srt8:

When I was underaged my Mom always bought alcohol for me and my friends as long as we drank it at the house.

Thats like the opposite of my mates mum who will buy him alcohol but not let him or other people drink in the house. stupid mother.

I just get either my sister or mum to get me alcohol, or my 18+ mates. One more year and I’ll be able to buy alcohol anyway. As for weed and smokes I dont need to worry as I don’t do them.

Read full topic
item.source: Where did you get your cigarettes/weed/alcohol as a kid?

item.title: Where did you get your cigarettes/weed/alcohol as a kid?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Well in my province I’m still not legal drinking age or old enough to buy smokes, until November. 5-10 minutes away, the age is 18 where I can buy booze and cigarettes. However I have a place in town here that doesn’t ID you.

Weed goes around by everyone I know pretty much. I have many dealers to go to.

Read full topic
item.source: Where did you get your cigarettes/weed/alcohol as a kid?

item.title: Where did you get your cigarettes/weed/alcohol as a kid?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Well, I usually buy cigarettes and snus (smokeless tobacco) in a immigrant corner shop. Sometimes they ask for ID and sometimes they don’t. I try my luck

There are 3 Koreans working there, 1 mother and 2 sons. The mother sells when the sons aren’t there and there aren’t any customers there

Alcohol: Friend who knows big sisters friends.

Weed: A park called Nygårdsparken in Bergen, Norway. It can be dangerous there though, so people don’t usually go alone when they buy drugs in there. Weed isn’t that much sold in Norway it seems. It’s more hash(ish). I have only been in there once and it wasn’t a good feeling, when the heroin addicts see two 15 year olds with lots of cash on them, you are a walking mug victim.

Read full topic
item.source: Where did you get your cigarettes/weed/alcohol as a kid?
